description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Can you pat your head and rub your stomach at the same time? Insanity is an intense blend of classic pong and space invaders. Multitask through twenty challenging levels to save your home planet, NExidus, from alien invasion.
